title: Aníbal Fernández - Wikipedia
snippet: In 2021, he was appointed as Minister of Security in replacement of Sabina Frederic, as part of a cabinet reshuffle following the government's poor showings in the 2021 legislative primary elections. title: Aníbal Fernández | AS/COA
snippet: During Kirchner’s government he was named minister of interior in 2003 and in 2007, and during Cristina Fernandez’s government, he was assigned as minister of justice, security and human rights.

title: Presidency of Alberto Fernández - Wikipedia
snippet: Fernández first appointed anthropologist Sabina Frederic as security minister. Frederic positioned herself as a staunch opponent of previous security minister Patricia Bullrich's policies.

title: Aníbal Fernández facts for kids
snippet: He has been a close supporter of former Presidents Néstor Kirchner and Cristina Fernández de Kirchner. From 2021 to 2023, he served as Argentina's Minister of Security under President Alberto Fernández.

title: The Berni Headlock and the Cristina Shake | Buenos Aires Times
